data.title: Gervais, OR, USA to Tirumala, India
data.meta_description: Time conversion from PDT (Pacific Daylight Time) (-7) to IST (India Standard Time)(+5:30). Gervais, OR, USA to Tirumala, India time zones converter, calculator, table and map.
data.text:
Time Difference

PDT (Pacific Daylight Time) is 12 hours and 30 minutes behind IST (India Standard Time)

7:00 pm19:00 in Gervais, OR, USA is 7:30 am07:30 in Tirumala, India

Gervais to Tirumala call time

Best time for a conference call or a meeting is between 6:30am-8:30am in Gervais which corresponds to 7pm-9pm in Tirumala

7:00 pm19:00 PDT (Pacific Daylight Time) (Gervais, OR, USA). Offset UTC -7:00 hours

7:30 am07:30 IST (India Standard Time) (Tirumala, India). Offset UTC +5:30 hours

7:00 pm19:00 Gervais, OR, USA / 7:30 am07:30 Tirumala, India
